My email is "wangray0110@gmail.com"
You can contact me for any questions.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Created using VFX Graph and SDF, particles can create irregular lines along their edges when in contact with SDF.

You can use your own model to create a new SDF file for use, or you can modify the color of the lines.
Pack includes 2 prefabs

1 Meshs
1 VFX files

Version：6000.0.3f1
Render Mode：HDRP

Official Website
https://www.youtube.com/@EricWang0110/featured
